kategorie_name.label: Kategoriename
kategorie_name.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

beschreibung.label: Beschreibung
beschreibung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

farbe.label: Farbe
farbe.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

titel.label: Aufgabentitel
titel.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

beschreibung.label: Beschreibung
beschreibung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

faelligkeitsdatum.label: Fälligkeitsdatum
faelligkeitsdatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

prioritaet.label: Priorität
prioritaet.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

kategorie.label: Kategorie
kategorie.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

aufgabe_titel.label: Aufgabe
aufgabe_titel.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

aufgabe_beschreibung.label: Notizen
aufgabe_beschreibung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

aufgabe_faelligkeit.label: Fällig am
aufgabe_faelligkeit.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

aufgabe_prioritaet.label: Priorität
aufgabe_prioritaet.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

aufgabe_kategorie.label: Kategorie
aufgabe_kategorie.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.
